suggestions.original: To improve the line combinations in the artwork, consider the following: 1. Enhance the background elements with more detailed and cohesive line work to create a more immersive environment. 2. Use varying line weights to add depth and emphasis to different parts of the scenes, such as foreground characters and important objects. 3. Ensure consistent line quality throughout the artwork to maintain visual harmony. 4. Integrate more dynamic and expressive lines to convey movement and emotion in the characters. 5. Refine the transitions between the four small scenes to create a smoother narrative flow. By addressing these areas, the overall visual impact and storytelling of the artwork can be significantly enhanced.
